DOC.brief_summary: Low-phenylalanine diet commonly prescribe people phenylketonuria ( PKU ) , inborn disease cause accumulation amino acid phenylalanine ( Phe ) blood . High blood Phe level cause mental , behavioural , neurological , physical problem . Thus , low-phenylalanine diet help patient manage condition clear whether impact appetite , energy intake change body weight . This important explore prevalence obesity population rise high . This study aim find effect PKU-type meal appetite , appetite biomarkers , post-meal energy expenditure . The investigator recruit 26 healthy adult ask participate two experimental trial . On one occasion participant ask consume PKU-supplemented drink follow PKU type-lunch another occasion supplement lunch base normally consume food . Series blood sample take appetite assessed experiment . Both experimental trial finish consume `` all-you-can-eat '' buffet .
